meanings: (눈에 들어오다) be seen, come in sight, (나타나다) appear
(보여 주다) show (sth to sb / sb sth), display, demonstrate, let sb see, (formal) exhibit

vlive.korean: 강이 보이면 리버뷰 바다가 보이면 오 오션... "If you see the river, it's a river view. If you see the ocean, it's the ocean..." 듣기 View video VICTON : 찬이의 라디오 로맨스..🖤-@🌙
vlive.english: "If you see the river, it's a river view. If you see the ocean, it's the ocean..."

vlive.korean: 목걸이 보이면 안되나? My necklace can't show? 듣기 View video CIX : 나랑 크리스마스 브이앱🎄
뻔히 보이면 좀 도와주지? Then, why don't you help me? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나는 누구를 좋아하는 걸까 [연애미수] EP04
vlive.english: Then, why don't you help me?

vlive.korean: 얼굴이 작아보이면 좋잖아요? It's good if your face looks small, right? 듣기 View video SmileJ : 올로드샵 한복 도화살 메이크업 K-Beauty 🇰🇷Hanbok Make-up⎮ 미소정 SmileJ
vlive.english: It's good if your face looks small, right?

vlive.korean: 여기 보이면 안 되는 거 없지? Is there anything I should not show to fans? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🥺
vlive.english: Is there anything I should not show to fans?

examples.korean: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들이 버릇없이 굴 때 너무 많은 관심을 보이면 오히려 더 골치 아파진다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That dog will give you a nasty bite, given half a chance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저 개는 틈만 보이면 맹렬히 물 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That dog will give you a nasty bite, given half a chance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If we take the lead in this, others may follow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 이 점에서 본보기를 보이면 다른 사람들도 따라 할지 모른다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If we take the lead in this, others may follow. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Teachers must put the brakes on, as it were, when they notice students looking puzzled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교사들은 이를테면 학생들이 어리둥절해하는 것 같아 보이면 제동을 걸어야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Teachers must put the brakes on, as it were, when they notice students looking puzzled. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Would you keep me posted of any new developments on the recent shareholder lawsuit? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 최근의 주주 소송과 관련해 새로운 진전이 보이면 제게 수시로 알려주시겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Would you keep me posted of any new developments on the recent shareholder lawsuit? Add to Wordbook
